releases.name: Version 0.4.20
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Fix inconsistent image viewer resizes
- Fix composer doesn't properly word-wrap
- Add input suggestions for @ mentions in tweet composer windows
- Add an option to save the last untweeted draft or get a confirmation on exiting tweet composer windows, to prevent accidental lost
- Change Media to expand to viewer size when enlarged
- Other small fixes and improvements

releases.name: Version 0.4.18
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Spell check and text area context menu is now available in the composer window for macOS

releases.name: Version 0.4.17
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Better image viewer controls and positioning logic
- Load missing tweets UI improvements and bug fixes
- Clicking on notifications should now correctly switch timelines when switching users

releases.name: Version 0.4.16
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Fixed keyboard shortcuts doesn't work in list of groups of direct messages
- Fixed direct messages isn't updated when new message arrives

releases.name: Version 0.4.15
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Small bump in dependencies (Electron 1.0 is here!).

releases.name: Version 0.4.14
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Proxy settings are now pulled from the system instead of in the preferences.
- Other bug fixes and small improvements.

The build is still failing on Travis-CI, but that's just NPM not happy with some peer dependencies.

releases.name: Version 0.4.13
releases.body: Bug fixes and other small improvements (af69a0b).

releases.name: Version 0.4.12
releases.body: New keyboard shortcuts, bug fixes, and some other small improvements.

releases.name: Version 0.4.11
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Video marker in tweets
- Small bug fixes and performance improvements

releases.name: Version 0.4.10
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Bug fixes and small improvements (06a4588)

releases.name: Version 0.4.9
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Fixed a bug that may prevent reconnection to Twitter on internet error.
- Added a feature to detect updates with indicators and a button take you to this page.

releases.name: Version 0.4.8
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Added picture and video upload
- Other small fixes and improvements

![Screenshot](http://p.ikemi.org/56bfb8a01ef69.jpg)

releases.name: Version 0.4.7
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Restore window size and location from last time
- Support for video and animated gifs
- Other small fixes and improvements

releases.name: Version 0.4.6
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Keyboard shortcuts for tweets
- Font size settings
- Other small fixes and improvements

And,
- Experimental SOCKS5 proxy

This is being released with minimal testing to get more feedback from you.

releases.name: Version 0.4.5
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Pictures now opens in-app.
- Better scrolling.
- Other small fixes and improvements.

---

[A new version v0.4.6 with experimental proxy has been released.](https://github.com/alchen/DTCP/releases/tag/v0.4.6)

releases.name: Version 0.4.4
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Bug fixes and small improvements

releases.name: Version 0.4.3
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Switch users when composing tweets
- More unread indicators
- Tray icon
- Other improvements and bug fixes

releases.name: Version 0.4.1
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Notifications
- Bug fixes

releases.name: Version 0.4.0
releases.body:
New in this release:
- Direct Messages
- Multi-user login
- Other minor fixes and improvements

Missing notifications are in the process of being revamped.

releases.name: Version 0.2.8
releases.body:
A few small bumps in version numbers has happened in the background.

Bug fixes and small improvements:
- Added keyboard shortcuts j,k as in Vi
- Tweet deletes now propagates to every frame
- New tweet windows should always intialize
- Up to date dependencies

releases.name: Version 0.2.5
releases.body: Bug fixes and performance improvements.

releases.name: Version 0.2.4
releases.body: More bug fixes and small improvements.

releases.name: Version 0.2.2
releases.body: Bug fixes and small enchancements.

releases.name: Version 0.2.1
releases.body:
New in this release (and the skipped 0.2.0):
- reconnect on disconnection
- (theoretically) infinite depth views
- and, transitions

Also added is a windows version preview; things won't always work there.

releases.name: Version 0.1.0
releases.body:
New in this release:
- New action feedbacks! This means when you delete a tweet, it will now actually disappear; the same goes for favorites and retweets.
- Better thread and profile displays.
- And, of course, many bug fixes.

releases.name: Bug fixes
releases.body: Mostly bug fixes, and that means notifications should start working.

releases.name: 「私はたぶん3人目だと思うから。」
releases.body:
v0.0.3

Still missing:
- When a tweet is retweeted/favorited/deleted, the timeline will not reflect the changes.

Changes:
- Lots of bug fixes
- Added user profile view when icons or user screen names are clicked

releases.name: A slightly more usable second release
releases.body:
There are many internal changes in this commit and a lot of refactored code to make future improvements easier.

Some of the changes include:
- Added links to embedded pictures
- Added thread view when tweets are clicked
- Remembers login information with logout button in the menubar
- Fixed rogue context menu
- Fixed new tweet window display problems with long tweets
- Enabled escape key for closing current new tweet window

Notably missing:
- When a tweet is retweeted/favorited/deleted, the timeline will not reflect the changes.
